about.title: About ForPublic.id
about.subtitle: We build digital bridges between communities and public services through accessible, transparent, and beneficial technology for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Creating a digital ecosystem that empowers every citizen to access public information and services easily, transparently, and equitably.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Developing digital platforms and applications that bridge the gap between government and society, promote transparency, and improve the quality of public services.

items.title: Transparency
items.description: We are committed to information openness and accountability in every service we provide.

items.title: Inclusivity
items.description: Technology we build can be accessed by all levels of society without discrimination.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We continue to innovate to provide the best solutions according to evolving community needs.

items.title: Care
items.description: Every feature we develop is based on empathy and care for user needs.

items.title: Positive Impact
items.description: We measure success from the positive impact directly felt by the community.

items.title: Trust
items.description: Building trust through reliability, security, and consistency in every service.

items.label: Free
items.description: All applications can be accessed at no cost

items.label: Available
items.description: Access anytime, anywhere for all users

cta.title: Let's Collaborate for Collective Progress
cta.description: Join us in our mission to create better access to public services. Contact us or visit our collaboration studio.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about ForPublic.id

items.question: What is ForPublic.id?
items.answer: ForPublic.id is a digital platform that provides various free applications to help communities easily access public information and services. We develop tools that support transparency, open data, and access to government services.

items.question: Are all applications on ForPublic.id free?
items.answer: Yes, all applications and services on ForPublic.id are completely free to use. We are committed to providing equal access to technology for all levels of society at no cost.

items.question: How can I access the available applications?
items.answer: You can access applications through the Applications page on our website. Click on the application you want to use and you will be directed to that application's platform. Most applications can be accessed directly through a web browser.

items.question: When will new applications be available?
items.answer: We regularly develop new applications based on community needs and feedback received. To get the latest updates, you can subscribe to our newsletter or follow ForPublic.id social media.

items.question: How is user data security guaranteed?
items.answer: User data security and privacy is our top priority. We apply high security standards and only collect data necessary to provide services. User data will not be shared with third parties without consent.
